author: Luc Olinga
title: Bitcoin Hits New Highs Daily, but Experts Warn It’s a ‘Crisis Mode’ Rally
description: The world’s largest cryptocurrency is on a historic run fueled by new money and government spending, but some analysts warn this is not a normal rally.
content:
Bitcoins historic rally continues with no signs of slowing down.
The worlds most famous cryptocurrency hit an all-time high overnight from Sunday to Monday, briefly surpassing the symbolic threshold… [+4527 chars]
